categories: Category:Victory-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Harrow was a Victory-class Star Destroyer in service to the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At one point, the Star Destroyer flew above a brown-colored celestial body. The ship was equipped with sublight engines.
The Harrow was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon on a card of the same name in the 2019 Rebellion in the Rim campaign expansion for Fantasy Flight Games' miniatures game Star Wars: Armada.

The vessel was originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, first appearing in the comic X-Wing Rogue Squadron 11. The issue was written by Michael A. Stackpole, illustrated by John Nadeau, and released by Dark Horse Comics on August 14, 1996.
